description.zh-cn: 中国共产党前中央委员会主席、中华人民共和国国务院总理华国锋的妻子。
description.en: Wife of Hua Guofeng, former Chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党前中央委员会主席、中华人民共和国国务院总理，韩芝俊的丈夫。
description.en: Former Chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, husband of Han Zhijun.

description.zh-cn: 韩芝俊的父亲，曾任五台县游击队长。
description.en: Father of Han Zhijun, former captain of the Wutai County guerrilla detachment.

description.zh-cn: 山西省的一个县，是韩芝俊的出生地。
description.en: A county in Shanxi Province, the birthplace of Han Zhijun.

description.zh-cn: 华国锋和韩芝俊的长子，已退休的中国人民解放军空军将军。
description.en: Eldest son of Hua Guofeng and Han Zhijun, a retired general of the PLA Air Force.

description.zh-cn: 华国锋和韩芝俊的次子，毕业于中国人民解放军国防大学，商人。
description.en: Second son of Hua Guofeng and Han Zhijun, a graduate of the PLA National Defence University and a businessman.

description.zh-cn: 华国锋和韩芝俊的长女，曾任中国民用航空局空中交通管理局党委常委、工会主席，全国政协委员。
description.en: Eldest daughter of Hua Guofeng and Han Zhijun, former member of the Party Standing Committee and Chairman of the Trade Union of the Air Traffic Management Bureau of the Civil Aviation Administration of China, and a member of the National Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 华国锋和韩芝俊的次女，国务院机关事务管理局局级干部，曾担任其父亲的生活秘书。
description.en: Second daughter of Hua Guofeng and Han Zhijun, a bureau-level official at the Government Offices Administration of the State Council, and formerly served as her father's personal secretary.

nodes.id: 中共晋中第一地区委员会

zh-cn: 中共晋中第一地区委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在晋中地区的早期地方组织。
description.en: An early local organization of the Communist Party of China in the Jinzhong area.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在湖南省湘潭地区的地方委员会。
description.en: The prefectural committee of the Communist Party of China in Xiangtan, Hunan Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的空军分支。
description.en: The aerial warfare service branch of the People's Liberation Army.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军国防大学

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军国防大学

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高军事学府。
description.en: The highest military academy of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国的一所高等院校。
description.en: An institute of technology in China.

nodes.id: 中国民用航空局空中交通管理局

zh-cn: 中国民用航空局空中交通管理局
民航总局空中交通管理局
en: Air Traffic Management Bureau of the Civil Aviation Administration of China

description.zh-cn: 负责管理中国民航空中交通的机构。
description.en: The agency responsible for managing civil air traffic in China.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会
en: National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议的全国性组织。
description.en: The national organization of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

nodes.id: 国务院机关事务管理局

zh-cn: 国务院机关事务管理局
en: Government Offices Administration of the State Council

description.zh-cn: 管理中华人民共和国国务院机关事务的机构。
description.en: An agency that manages the affairs of the offices of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东的妻子，在韩芝俊之前担任中华人民共和国最高领导人夫人。
description.en: Wife of Mao Zedong, served as the wife of the Paramount Leader of the People's Republic of China before Han Zhijun.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的缔造者之一和第一代最高领导人。
description.en: A founder and the first paramount leader of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平的妻子，在韩芝俊之后担任中华人民共和国最高领导人夫人。
description.en: Wife of Deng Xiaoping, served as the wife of the Paramount Leader of the People's Republic of China after Han Zhijun.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第二代中央领导集体的核心，中华人民共和国的第二代最高领导人。
description.en: The core of the second generation of central leadership of the Communist Party of China and the second paramount leader of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国最高领导人

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高领导人
en: Paramount leader of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国党和政府的实际最高领导人职位。
description.en: The de facto top leader position of the party and government of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院总理

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院总理
en: Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府（国务院）的负责人。
description.en: The head of the Central People's Government (State Council) of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 1949年1月，时任中共晋中第一地区委员会宣传部长的华国锋与韩芝俊结婚。
description.en: In January 1949, Hua Guofeng, then chief of the propaganda department of the CPC Jinzhong First Prefectural Committee, married Han Zhijun.

description.zh-cn: 韩七海是韩芝俊的父亲。
description.en: Han Qihai is the father of Han Zhijun.

description.zh-cn: 韩芝俊出生于山西省五台县。
description.en: Han Zhijun was born in Wutai County, Shanxi Province.

description.zh-cn: 韩芝俊是中国共产党党员，曾担任湖南湘潭地委干部。
description.en: Han Zhijun is a member of the Communist Party of China and served as a cadre of the Xiangtan Prefectural Committee in Hunan.

description.zh-cn: 韩芝俊曾担任湖南湘潭地委干部。
description.en: Han Zhijun served as a cadre of the Xiangtan Prefectural Committee in Hunan.

relationships.target: 中共晋中第一地区委员会

description.zh-cn: 1949年1月与韩芝俊结婚时，华国锋担任中共晋中第一地区委员会宣传部长。
description.en: When he married Han Zhijun in January 1949, Hua Guofeng was the chief of the propaganda department of the CPC Jinzhong First Prefectural Committee.

description.en: Second daughter

relationships.target: 国务院机关事务管理局

description.zh-cn: 在中华人民共和国最高领导人夫人这一身份上，韩芝俊是江青的继任者。
description.en: As the wife of the Paramount Leader of the People's Republic of China, Han Zhijun was the successor to Jiang Qing.

description.zh-cn: 在中华人民共和国最高领导人夫人这一身份上，卓琳是韩芝俊的继任者。
description.en: As the wife of the Paramount Leader of the People's Republic of China, Zhuo Lin was the successor to Han Zhijun.
